summary.span: 提供用于显示日历的控件功能。

span.span: Provides control capability to display a calendar.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日历显示为按天、 周或月。The calendar display is by day, week, or month. 是否在移动设备上呈现整月取决于设备的功能。Whether an entire month is rendered on a mobile device depends on the capabilities of the device. 一般情况下，控件允许的日期选择。In general, the control permits the selection of a date. 移动控件换行 Web 窗体控件。The mobile control wraps a Web Forms control. 尽管移动控件模仿某些属性、 方法和基础控件的事件，它不公开特定于 HTML 呈现其他属性。Although the mobile control mimics some properties, methods, and events of the underlying control, it does not expose other properties specific to HTML rendering. 若要修改这些，你可以访问通过基础控件属性并直接修改设置。To modify these, you can access the underlying control through the property and modify the settings directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何页负载代码块中的属性允许用户选择一天、 周或月块的时间。The following code example shows how the property in the page load code block allows the user to select a day, a week, or a month block of time. 此示例将设置和属性来区分用户选择的类。This example sets the and properties of the class to distinguish the user selection. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCalendarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET API 中，枚举返回的一周的第一天的服务器的本地设置的默认值与包含每个日期是星期几。In the ASP.NET API, the enumeration contains every day of the week, with the default value returning the server's local setting for the first day of the week. 此属性函数相同的方式属性。This property functions the same way as the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时用户选择一天、 周或整月，通过单击日期选择器控件将引发事件。The event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 在重写方法在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 ASP.NET 内部调用此方法。This method is called internally by ASP.NET. 它提供包装，引发事件时由用户选择日期。It provides a wrapper to raise the event when a date is selected by the user. 与不同方法，此方法时公开，并且在收集所选的日期可以由不同的适配器。Unlike the method, this method is public and can be called by different adapters when they have collected the selected date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，使用此属性连同属性来确定的所选的日期控件。Typically, you use this property together with the property to determine the selected date of a control. 若要执行此操作，将设置属性-此设置允许仅从选择一个日期控件。To do this, set the property to - this setting allows only a single date selection from the control. 浏览到一个或下一个月不会更新此属性。Browsing to the next or previous month will not update this property. 此属性具有相同的功能作为 ASP.NET属性。This property has the same functionality as the ASP.NET property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来引用所选的日期。The following code example demonstrates how to the use the property to refer to the selected day. 此示例的一个更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 窗体枚举提供了下表中描述的选择。The Web Forms enumeration provides the selections described in the following table. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期。A single date can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单日或整周。A single date or entire week can be selected on the control.| ||可以在 控件上选择单个日期、周或整月。A single date, week, or entire month can be selected on the control.| ||在 控件上不能选择任何日期。No dates can be selected on the control. **注意：**避免使用此值，因为某些浏览器仍允许用户选择一个日期。**Note:** Avoid using this value, because some browsers still allow the user to select a date.|

exception.span: 指定的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 移动控件均不重复的 ASP.NET Web 窗体的属性移动设备不支持的控件。The ASP.NET mobile controls do not duplicate the properties of the ASP.NET Web Forms control that are not supported on mobile devices. 因此，如果你想要使用所提供的基础功能控件，则通过做到访问对象通过属性。Thus, if you want to use features that are available for the underlying control, you do so by accessing the object through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来应用格式设置选项仅适用于基础控件。The following code example uses the property to apply formatting that is only available in the underlying control. 此示例的一个更大的代码示例摘自概述。This example is part of a larger code sample for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/cs/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)] [!code-vb[MobileCalendarExample#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCalendarExample/vb/MobileCalendarExample.aspx#10)]
